summary: Save game with  main quest complete
descriptionHtml:
Jeremy Pinton is a young breton mage. He lives in Whiterun and works with Faregar.
Few days ago he received a letter from College of Magic in Winterold. He want to attend this school. He\'s dream? Become a good mage such us his teacher Farengar!
A simple savegame with main quest complete!

--> How to install: It is a simple save. Just put save in your document data - my games - skyrim - save.
--> Mod Requires: if you want Jeremy look like pic, you must install this wonderful mods:
    - Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul 
    - XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius
    - ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii (male version)
    - Pretty Eyes by pikkatze
    - Beards by Hvergelmir
author: Nephae
